author: mdzol.com
title: Chocó contra un camión y murió: su pareja se salvó porque se tiró del auto
text:
Chocó contra un camión y murió: su pareja se salvó porque se tiró del auto
Un hombre falleció luego de que el auto en el que viajaba impactara contra un camión con acoplado. El vehículo se incendió. Su pareja se arrojó del auto en movimiento minutos antes del choque.
Un terrible choque sacudió este miércoles al mediodía a la capital cordobesa cuando el conductor de un automóvil perdió la vida tras chocar de frente con un camión con acoplado, en el tramo que une esa ciudad de Córdoba con Villa Allende.
El hombre perdió la vida luego de que el auto en el que viajaba impactara de frente contra un camión con acoplado. El vehículo se incendió tras el choque y el conductor murió en el acto.
La víctima fatal es un hombre de entre 30 y 35 años, que iba a bordo junto a una mujer, quien sería su pareja, y la que sobrevivió debido a que se arrojó del vehículo antes de la colisión. Uno de los datos más impactantes del caso es el testimonio de la mujer, que relató ante los efectivos policiales y personal médico que se lanzó del vehículo debido a una fuerte discusión que mantenía con su pareja.
Esa declaración abrió una de las principales líneas de investigación: determinar si hubo algún comportamiento intencional al volante o si se trató de una fatalidad en medio de un momento de tensión. “La mujer resultó con heridas leves y fue atendida en el lugar por una ambulancia del servicio de emergencias”, indicaron fuentes policiales de Córdoba.
Según los primeros peritajes, el auto cruzó de carril y chocó de frente contra el camión, que venía en sentido contrario. La violencia del choque hizo que el vehículo menor se incendiara rápidamente, impidiendo que el conductor pudiera salir con vida.
La Fiscalía de Turno ya tomó intervención y ordenó una serie de peritajes para reconstruir la mecánica del hecho. Además, tomó declaración testimonial a la mujer que sobrevivió. También se revisaron las cámaras de seguridad del sector para corroborar los movimientos previos al siniestro.

author: gameon
title: Ninja Gaiden 2 Black é revelado na Xbox Developer Direct e já está disponível
text:
Ninja Gaiden 2 Black é revelado na Xbox Developer Direct e já está disponível
Nova versão do game foi feita na Unreal Engine 5, prometendo ser a experiência definitiva de Ninja Gaiden 2
Logo após Ninja Gaiden 4 ser anunciado na Xbox Developer Direct 2025, a Koei Tecmo e o Team Ninja revelaram Ninja Gaiden 2 Black para PC, PlayStation 5 e Xbox Series X|S, que pode ser jogado também via Game Pass. O lançamento ocorrerá ainda hoje.
Trata-se de uma nova versão do game, feita no motor gráfico Unreal Engine 5. Nela foram incorporadas algumas adições de Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2, mas mantendo a sensação, desafio e a violência que consagraram o jogo de Xbox 360. Também foram feitos ajustes no sistema de upgrade de armas para ficar mais alinhado com aquele do jogo original.
Ninja Gaiden 2 Black também conta com novos visuais e personagens jogáveis adicionais.
Confira o trailer divulgado com o anúncio e lançamento, mostrando o game em ação:
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Eric Lagatta
title: Microsoft layoffs: 1,900 Activision Blizzard, Xbox jobs cut
text: Microsoft layoffs: 1,900 workers at Activision Blizzard and Xbox to be let go [Eric Lagatta](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5803430002/eric-lagatta/) [Paul Davidson](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/2646662001/paul-davidson/) Microsoft will lay off 1,900 employees at Activision Blizzard and Xbox, the latest tech company to announce cuts so far in 2024. The layoffs represent about an 8% cut of its video gaming staff of 22,000 workers and come months after Microsoft [acquired Activision](/story/money/2023/10/13/microsoft-activision-blizzard-call-of-duty-acquisition-deal/71167139007/) in a blockbuster deal. The $69 billion transaction in October represented one of the largest tech deals in history as Microsoft took over the studios behind bestselling games like Call of Duty, Diablo and Overwatch for its Xbox console. The planned cuts are part of a larger “execution plan” that would reduce “areas of overlap,” Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer wrote in an internal memo, which was quoted in multiple news reports. "We are grateful for all of the creativity, passion and dedication they have brought to our games, our players and our colleagues," Spencer is quoted as saying in the memo. "We will provide our full support to those who are impacted during the transition." Microsoft confirmed news of the layoffs when reached Thursday by USA TODAY but declined to provide a copy of the memo. Layoffs: [Business Insider to lay off around 8% of employees in latest media job cuts](/story/money/2024/01/25/business-insider-layoffs/72351587007/) Blizzard executives announce resignations Microsoft's acquisition of Activision Blizzard was seen as [ a strategy to keep pace](/story/money/2024/01/16/microsoft-worth-more-than-apple/72239504007/) with Sony and Nintendo in a console race by adding more games to its multi-game subscription service and cloud gaming libraries. Microsoft’s Xbox gaming console, which ranks third in sales behind PlayStation and Nintendo, seeks to fold Activision titles into its Game Pass service, which isn't unlike Netflix but for video games. The Wall Street Journal [reported](https://www.wsj.com/tech/microsoft-layoffs-videogaming-staff-4cc124c7?page=1) that the planned cuts, which mostly target Activision Blizzard employees, reflect "redundancies" after the October acquisition of video game company. Spencer said in the cited memo that Microsoft would provide location-dependent severance to all laid-off employees. Alongside the layoffs, two Blizzard Entertainment executives are leaving the company, President Mike Ybarra and design chief Allen Adham, a Microsoft spokesman told multiple outlets. Ybarra confirmed the news himself of his immediate departure in a [post](https://twitter.com/Qwik/status/1750527310493868293) Thursday on social media platform X. "Leading Blizzard through an incredible time and being part of the team, shaping it for the future ahead, was an absolute honor," Ybarra said in the post. Other tech layoffs in the news Several big-name companies have already announced 2024 job cuts, including [Amazon](/story/money/2024/01/10/twitch-layoffs-job-cuts/72174329007/), [eBay](/story/money/2024/01/24/ebay-layoffs-2024/72335627007/) and In the tech sector, at least, job cuts are fewer this year than last. Another layoff tracking site, [Layoffs.fyi](https://layoffs.fyi/), reports that [76 tech companies had announced 21,370 layoffs](https://layoffs.fyi/) through late January. By contrast, 277 firms had laid off 89,709 workers through January 2023. But some economists foresee more layoffs to come, amid talk of a [possible economic slowdown later in 2024](/story/money/2024/01/22/shrinking-profits-spark-layoffs/72283931007/).

author: Tim Lammers
title: Travis Kelce Gives In, Reviews Taylor Swift's Favorite Christmas Movie
text:
Travis Kelce—who first rejected a suggestion that he review his girlfriend Taylor Swift’s favorite Christmas movie for his and brother Jason Kelce’s New Heights podcast—recently gave in to the idea.
In early December, Jason Kelce’s wife, Kylie Kelce called into the New Heights podcast to recommend that her husband and brother-in-law watch the 2003 Christmas movie classic Love Actually to review on the Film Club segment of their show.
Neither Jason nor Travis Kelce were enthused by the prospect of watching the film, even though it’s reportedly Taylor Swift’s favorite Christmas movie—and a favorite of Kylie Kelce’s, too.
Forbes Blockbuster Musical ‘Wicked’ Gets Digital Streaming Premiere Date By Tim Lammers “Yeah, don’t f—-ing torture me; torture your husband,” Travis Kelce told his sister-in-law on the podcast (via The Daily Mail ). “I’m an innocent bystander here, Ky. Don’t f—-ing come for me.”
Blockbuster Musical ‘Wicked’ Gets Digital Streaming Premiere Date Google User Data Purge Underway—What You Need To Know Dark Web Facial ID Farm Warning—Hackers Build Identity Fraud Database However, the Kelce brothers had a change of heart and recently watched Love Actually .
The duo reviewed the film—which features a huge ensemble cast including Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Keira Knightley and Liam Neeson—during the Dec. 24 episode of the New Heights podcast.
Forbes Travis Kelce Calls Taylor Swift’s Favorite Christmas Movie ‘Torture’ By Tim Lammers In Love Actually, a group of loosely connected characters’ stories all intertwine around Christmastime in the U.K.
Surprisingly, Travis Kelce gave the film a positive take at the beginning of the podcast despite his previous comments.
“Jason, you might be the oddball out here. I actually enjoyed Love Actually ,” Travis Kelce told his brother.
Jason Kelce responded, “I will concede it’s not an unenjoyable movie to watch. My issue is the Christmas aspect of it and then … but the overall sentiments and lessons and overall values that it expunges—expounds—are absolutely horrendous.”
Travis Kelce Admits ‘I Didn’t Feel Christmas At All’ In Taylor Swift’s Holiday Favorite Kylie Kelce, who joined her Jason Kelce and Travis Kelce on the podcast, held her ground before their full critique of Love Actually , noting, “I really do love the movie.”
Kylie Kelce did, however, have a sneaking suspicion about her husband’s take, “I can’t wait for him to sit her and s—t on the movie for 10 minutes.”
And while the retired Philadelphia Eagles didn’t completely pan Love Actually , he did have some harsh observations about it.
Forbes 25 Big Movies Coming To Theaters In 2025 By Tim Lammers “ Love Actually may be the worst Christmas movie I’ve ever seen,” Jason Kelce said. “I don’t even know if it’s up for debate.”
Travis Kelce then added, “I didn’t feel Christmas at all during the movie.”
“There was zero Christmas spirit or anything resembling [it],” Jason Kelce continued.
Travis Kelce agreed with his brother about the Christmas aspect of Love Actually , noting, “I enjoyed the movie … I just didn’t understand how much it really tied into Christmas.”
Forbes ‘A Complete Unknown’ Reviews: Are Critics In Tune With Bob Dylan Film? By Tim Lammers “Not only does it not tie into Christmas … It was the worst family values of all time tied into Christmas,” Jason Kelce said. “[They’re], like, bad people.”
While Jason Kelce wasn’t a fan of Love Actually, he was album to take in a different form of entertainment on Christmas Day when Travis Kelce suited up for the first-ever NFL game on Netflix as his team, the Kansas City Chiefs, took on the Pittsburgh Steelers.
Travis Kelce, who plays tight end, caught eight passes for 84 yards and scored a touchdown in the Chiefs’ victory over the Steelers, 29-10.
Forbes In Memoriam: Movie And TV Actors Who Died In 2024 By Tim Lammers

author: HispanTV
title: Fuerzas yemeníes atacan un barco comercial británico en el mar Rojo | HISPANTV
text:
Las Fuerzas Armadas de Yemen informan que sus misiles han logrado golpear directamente un buque mercante británico en las aguas del mar Rojo.
“Como parte de la respuesta a la agresión estadounidense-británica contra nuestro país, las Fuerzas Armadas yemeníes atacaron con misiles navales apropiados a un barco mercante británico en el mar Rojo que se dirigía a los puertos de la Palestina ocupada”, ha informado este jueves el portavoz del Ejército de Yemen, el teniente general Yahya Sari.
Sari ha indicado que el ataque de represalia de Yemen se llevó a cabo en apoyo al pueblo palestino y dentro de la respuesta a la agresión estadounidense-británica contra Yemen.
Ha advertido que su país continuará sus operaciones en los mares Arábigo y Rojo e impedirá el paso de barcos israelíes o de otros que se dirijan a los puertos de la Palestina ocupada hasta que el régimen sionista cese su agresión y se levante el asedio a la Franja de Gaza.
Yemen jura poner “doloroso fin” a la hegemonía de EEUU en el mar Rojo Yemen confirma impacto de su misil en buque de EEUU en mar Rojo | HISPANTV Las Fuerzas Armadas de Yemen informan que sus misiles han logrado golpear directamente un buque mercante estadounidense en las aguas del mar Rojo. Yemen efectúa 21 operaciones contra 24 barcos afiliados a Israel Desde el 19 de noviembre de 2023 hasta el 31 de enero de 2024, las Fuerzas Armadas yemeníes llevaron a cabo 21 operaciones navales dirigidas a 24 barcos. Los barcos eran tres de propiedad israelí, nueve son estadounidenses, dos británicos y otros 10 que se dirigían a los puertos palestinos ocupados.
¿A qué barcos Yemen ataca en el mar Rojo? Desde que el régimen de Israel comenzó su guerra contra Gaza en octubre pasado, y con el fin de ofrecer apoyo y reducir el sufrimiento del pueblo palestino, las Fuerzas Armadas han realizado ataques contra objetivos israelíes, así como contra embarcaciones de la entidad sionista y de otros países que navegan por los mares Rojo y Arábico con destinos a puertos en los territorios ocupados.
Los ataques de represalia de Yemen han provocado daños en la economía de Israel y limitado la entrega de ayuda a este régimen, que depende mucho de los apoyos logísticos de las potencias mundiales para seguir con sus masacres en el enclave costero.
Por ello, a partir de enero, so pretexto proteger la seguridad del mar Rojo, Estados Unidos y el Reino Unido y otros aliados han bombardeado varias ciudades de Yemen en el marco de una alianza multinacional.
Yemen asegura que nunca se rendirá ante ataques EEUU-Reino Unido mkh

author: andyrhi
title: Digital hd tv channels not working, bbc itv channel 4
text:
For help with your TalkTalk TV box, channels and apps.
an hour ago
Hi
For about 3 weeks our bbc, itv and channel 4 hd channels have lost signal through our talktalk tv box. I originally put this down to the weather but it has continued.
This happened about 2 or 3 years ago and was fixed by talktalk sending a replacement box.
Is there a way to test the current tv box we have?
Pretty sure that the aerial isn't to blame, exactly as last time.
Thanks
Andy
an hour ago
Hi
Connect the aerial directly to the TV when the signal is weak and see if the picture breaks up rtc, this will give an indication if there is a weak signal from the transmitter.
Thanks
Karl.

author: Julius Dröger
title: Nach Flutkatastrophe: Eltern verwirklichen Traum ihrer verstorbenen Tochter
text:
Mit einer besonderen Patisserie in Hamburg erinnert ein Paar an seine Tochter Johanna, die 2021 bei der Flutkatastrophe im Ahrtal gestorben ist. Den Plan der leidenschaftlichen Bäckerin und Konditorin haben Ralph und Inka Orth postum verwirklicht. Seit Anfang 2024 betreiben sie die „Pâtisserie Johanna“ in der Hafencity.
Johanna träumte von eigener Patisserie
„Die Patisserie war immer ein Traum von Johanna. Johanna wollte schon sehr, sehr früh diesen Beruf lernen“, sagt Vater Ralph Orth. Und sie plante eine eigene Patisserie zu gründen. Im April 2021 hatte die gelernte Konditorin aus Bad Neuenahr die Meisterschule beendet. Für ihren zukünftigen Laden hatte sie schon einen Business-Plan erstellt und ein Logo entwerfen lassen.
Das Paar hatte Hamburg, als eine seiner Lieblingsstädte, für die Konditorei-Eröffnung gewählt und pendelt jetzt zwischen Rheinland-Pfalz und der Hansestadt. Es gibt Törtchen, Macarons, Gebäck und Quiche auch ein Online-Shop gehört dazu. Eine „Signature-Praline“ mit Kirsch-Nougat-Füllung und einem Schmetterling ist Johanna gewidmet.
Das richtige Rezeptur dafür zu finden sei nicht leicht gewesen, sagt Mutter Inka Orth. „Aber irgendwann war sie wirklich so, wie Johanna sie bei ihrer Prüfung gemacht hatte.“
Fotos erinnern an Johanna
Aber die Patisserie ist auch Erinnerungsort - an den Wänden hängen Fotos der Verstorbenen. „Uns tut das sehr gut und es war uns sehr, sehr wichtig.“ Durch die Bilder sowie von einem Künstler entworfenen Bronze-Statuen lebe sie weiter. „Für uns bedeutet es, dass wir jeden Tag über Johanna sprechen und sie dadurch auch weiterhin mit der Mittelpunkt der Familie ist.“
Viele Gäste kämen auch wegen der Geschichte der Tochter - einige von ihnen hätten auch Schicksale erlebt. „Manchmal gibt es Kunden, die einfach reinkommen und sagen: Darf ich Sie mal in den Arm nehmen - das ist voll in Ordnung für uns.“ Denn tröstende Worte gebe es für ihre Trauer oft nicht.
Bei der Flutkatastrophe in der Nacht vom 14. auf den 15. Juli 2021 kamen in Rheinland-Pfalz 136 Menschen ums Leben. Im benachbarten Nordrhein-Westfalen starben bei dem Hochwasser nach extremem Starkregen 49 Menschen. Tausende Häuser wurden zerstört, Straßen und Brücken weggespült.
© dpa-infocom, dpa:250710-930-780804/1

author: @eltreceoficial
title: El ex de Jesica Cirio se descompensó en la cárcel: por qué tuvo que ser atendido de urgencia
text:
El ex de Jesica Cirio recibió un revés judicial y no lo soportó. El empresario Elías Picccirillo se descompensó y tuvo que ser atendido de urgencia. El financista deberá permanecer detenido hasta el juicio oral y también afrontará su divorcio de Cirio.
LEÉ MÁS: Aseguran que Jesica Cirio le reclama “una montaña de guita” a Elías Piccirillo
Este miércoles el juez federal Sebastián Casanello dictó la prisión preventiva para el exmarido de Jesica Cirio y, como si esto fuera poco, lo embargó por 100 millones de pesos. Además, seguirá preso hasta el juicio oral.
EL EX DE JESICA CIRIO SE DESCOMPENSÓ EN LA CÁRCEL
El empresario Elías Piccirillo se enteró de la resolución a través de su abogado: se descompensó al instante y tuvo que ser asistido por un médico dentro del penal de Ezeiza.
“Está muy bajoneado. Él pensaba que le iban a dar la excarcelación”, contó Fernando Sicilia, el abogado del ex de Jesica Cirio y también había puesto sobre el foco los ataques de pánico que sufría el financista.

author: world today news
title: The president’s son Hunter Biden discovered responsible of illegally possessing a weapon
text:
2024-06-11 17:30, akt.2024-06-11 18:45
publication
2024-06-11 17:30
replace
2024-06-11 18:45
share
US President Joe Biden’s son, Hunter Biden, was discovered responsible on Tuesday of illegally buying and possessing weapons in reference to drug use. That is the primary time in historical past that the son of a sitting US president has been convicted. Joe Biden has dominated out pardoning his son.
Foot. Hannah Beier / / Reuters / Discussion board
Hunter Biden was discovered responsible on two counts of mendacity about his drug use on an authorization type to buy a Colt Cobra revolver in 2018 and on one rely of possession of a firearm by an individual who makes use of or is hooked on medication.
A jury in federal courtroom in Wilmington, Delaware, reached a unanimous resolution on the decision after simply three hours of deliberations. As MSNBC reported, the choice was made so rapidly that US First Woman Jill Biden didn’t have time to learn the decision.
Decide Maryellen Noreika, who’s main the trial, will resolve on the punishment for the president’s son in a separate listening to, the date of which has not but been set. Noreika introduced that the listening to would happen in roughly 120 days, i.e. in October, simply earlier than the presidential elections. She didn’t arrest Hunter Biden.
The president’s son faces as much as 25 years in jail, however specialists anticipate a a lot milder sentence, maybe suspended – because of the convict’s clear document and the truth that there was no different severe crime. Former Donald Trump lawyer Tim Parlatore informed CNN that below federal regulation, Biden ought to obtain as much as six months in jail, however may additionally keep away from spending time behind bars.
In a press release launched after the decision, President Joe Biden confirmed he wouldn’t pardon his son and accepted the decision and “the judicial course of whereas Hunter considers an attraction.” He added that he was happy with his son’s struggle towards habit.
“Jill and I’ll at all times love and help Hunter. Nothing will change that,” he famous.
After Hunter’s sentencing, Biden stated he was grateful for his household and mates’ help and expressed disappointment with the decision.
Hunter Biden is the primary son of a sitting US president to be convicted in a felony trial. The case within the Delaware courtroom was one in every of two introduced by particular prosecutor David Weiss. Biden Jr.’s second trial for tax crimes, together with failure to pay taxes, is scheduled to start in September in California. Initially, Weiss and Hunter Biden’s legal professionals reached a plea deal in each circumstances, because of which he would keep away from jail. Nonetheless, the settlement was questioned by the choose presiding over the trial in Delaware and finally the events didn’t attain an settlement.
Within the trial lasting simply over every week, testifying about Hunter Biden’s drug habit included: his former companion Hallie Biden, ex-wife, author Kathleen Buhle and his daughter Naomi. Investigators introduced recordings of him taking cocaine. Incriminating proof additionally included Hunter Biden’s personal phrases from his autobiography that after returning to Delaware in 2018, “he spent all his power taking medication and arranging drug purchases – feeding the beast.” Hunter Biden’s attorneys argued in courtroom that the prosecution did not show that their consumer deliberately lied on his gun utility.
Lately, the president’s son has been one of many primary targets of political assaults by Republicans, who additionally accused him of “buying and selling his father’s affect” in contacts with international contractors, together with China and Ukraine. Regardless of a years-long investigation by the Home Oversight Committee and the formal initiation of an impeachment inquiry, Republicans have but to show that President Biden was concerned in his son’s actions.
Oskar Górzyński from Washington
